translation.en: The future of artificial intelligence, and it all started with this.
translation.de: Damit begann die Zukunft der KI.

translation.en: [Mr. Short] Ah, Alfred. Hmm.
Hang on. Innovation, seven? For the King Croc sub aqua drone? I mean,
translation.de: Nur 7 Innovation? Für die King-Croc-Unterwasserdrohne? Was?

translation.en: this thing completely changed the face of deep-sea rescue.
There's some frankly offensive inaccuracies.
They should let us write the stats. That'd be so cool, and way more accurate.
translation.de: -Wir sollten die entwerfen. -Das wäre cool. Viel genauer.

translation.en: Nas, I heard a little rumor going around the message boards that--
translation.de: Nas, ich hörte online ein Gerücht…

translation.en: Well, hear me out. Whatever he's launching, today, right, is gonna make every single one of these obsolete.
translation.de: Hör zu. Was er heute launcht, macht die alle überflüssig.

translation.en: We're talking straight tens.
It's just gossip. I know you don't like to listen to that…
No, course not.
-But what if it's true? -Right.
I mean, after this trip, the world may never be the same again.
translation.de: Nach dem Ausflug könnte alles anders sein.

translation.en: Bus can't get here quick enough.
Literally. It's five minutes late.
translation.de: Er ist fünf Minuten zu spät.

translation.en: Oh, Mindy.
-Intelligence, zero? That's ridiculous. -What?
Lucky for him, I've got the reflexes of a cat that can drive.
What's he doing out in the daytime? Something must be wrong.
translation.de: Er ist am Tag hier? Da stimmt was nicht.

translation.en: Sophie, he's a spiky ball. Nothing's hurting him.
Get him in the car.
-Sure you won't get in trubbs? -We've talked about "trubbs,"
and I think I've earned a bit of credit with an emergency stop like that.
translation.de: Dank mir lieber für meine Notbremsung.

translation.en: Right, Jeff?
I think he's dehydrated. We need some water.
How can you tell? Not like he has a range of expressions. He literally has one, "I'm a hedgehog."
translation.de: Woher weißt du das? Sein einziger Gesichtsausdruck ist "Igel".

translation.en: Misha, your lesson was only booked till 8, so I'd appreciate it--
translation.de: Misha, die Fahrstunde ging bis 8, daher…

translation.en: No backseat driving please, Jeff. I'm trying to concentrate.
-The bus leaves at 8, right? -I think so?
Yeah. Loads of time.
[Sophie] Careful, you're scaring him. I'm not scared.
translation.de: -Du machst ihm Angst. -Ich habe keine Angst.

translation.en: -I find it a bit difficult to work-- -Not everything's about you, Jeff.
We have three minutes to catch the bus. We can either be careful or we can be quick.
translation.de: 3 Minuten bis zum Bus. Entweder vorsichtig oder schnell.

translation.en: -I vote careful. -I vote quick.
Overruled, Jeff.
[woman] Can't talk, babe. No, I'm driving.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht reden. Ich fahre.

translation.en: Yeah, he's got a science trip.
You know that fella with the robots?
Yeah, he's into all of that, apparently.
translation.de: Ja, anscheinend mag er so was.

translation.en: Oh, I know. Oh, it's tragic.
translation.de: Oh, ich weiß. Es ist tragisch.

translation.en: No, look I really can't talk.
Get out! She didn't!
Hello, Tom's mom. Daniel, I keep telling you, you can call me Julie.
translation.de: -Hallo, Toms Mum. -Daniel, bitte nenne mich Julie.

translation.en: -Hi, Julie. -So, off to look at some robots, are you?
translation.de: -Hi, Julie. -Ihr schaut euch also ein paar Roboter an?

translation.en: Yeah, it's a day off school, innit?
Well, you enjoy yourself.
-Don't do anything I wouldn't do. -All right.
Ha! See that?
Hey, Mom, see you later, yeah? Maybe after--
-She's all right, your mom. -Yes, okay, man.
Skelly, don't you think Tom's mom's all right?
translation.de: Skelly, ist Toms Mum nicht ok?

translation.en: Yeah, she's more than all right, Tom.
Come on.
Grab it!
Pass it.
♪ That hat is mine I wear it all the time ♪
translation.de: Die Mütze ist meine Ich trag sie ganz alleine

translation.en: ♪ You think that you're cool But you look like a fool, let's go! ♪
translation.de: Bist kein Augenschmaus Siehst idiotisch aus

translation.en: ♪ So, try it on I bet you look the bomb ♪
translation.de: Setz sie auf Siehst sicher mega aus

translation.en: ♪ If you make me late to class I'll stick this hat right up your-- ♪
translation.de: Komme ich später Steck ich sie dir in den…

translation.en: Enough.
-Please go. It's far too early for improv. -[playful music plays]
translation.de: Bitte geht. Für Improv ist es zu früh.

translation.en: -Love you, Daddy. -I love you, Bethan.
-Love you, Mr. Conner! -Get out of my van, Joshua.
Yo, wait up.
-So, I shall see you back here. -Ten o'clock on the dot.
-Be on time… -You'll be fine.
-You'll do great… -If you're not late.
-Don't forget. -I love you, but all this rhyming is gonna throw off my schedule.
translation.de: -Denk dran… -Hab dich lieb. Aber das hält mich auf.

translation.en: -Have fun, darling. -Bye.
[laughs] Anti-gravity? Cellular regeneration?
Nanotech? He's Dalton Monkhouse, what's he gonna do next?
translation.de: Nanotech? Was macht Dalton Monkhouse als Nächstes?

translation.en: Good morning, sir. How are we, today?
translation.de: Guten Morgen, Sir. Wie geht es?

translation.en: Honestly, Chelsea, not great.
Still on your brother-in-law's sofa? The bus hasn't shown up yet.
translation.de: -Wohnen Sie noch beim Schwager? -Der Bus kommt nicht.

translation.en: Wait, hang on. How'd you know about that?
Hey there. I hope you're having a lovely morning.
I am, thank you.
Listen, I hate to be a pain, but I'm calling from Braelawn Academy.
translation.de: Ich störe ungern. Ich rufe von der Braelawn Academy an.

translation.en: Yeah. Not yet.
Okay. Just around the corner?
So, it'll only be 25 minutes late.
How old am I?
Old enough to know I'll be expecting a sizable discount on the invoice.
translation.de: Alt genug, um Rabatt zu verlangen.

translation.en: You take care.
One minute late! And that is basically early.
translation.de: -Eine Minute zu spät! -Und das ist im Grunde früh.

translation.en: Cheers, Jeff. Reckon I'm ready for my test, yeah?
translation.de: Danke, Jeff. Ich bin vorbereitet, ja?

translation.en: [Mr. Short] Right, here they come.
Nice and slow, please. No, don't push.
Excuse me, can we please just get on the bus…
Steps do not compute. Ow, my robo-shins.
Get on the bus, please, Josh.
Guys… Excuse me, guys.
Please be careful.
Make your way up to the left. If there's no space, go upstairs.
translation.de: Nach links. Ist es voll, ab nach oben.

translation.en: Kiss!
-I'm sorry, sir. -It's all right.
I'm not great with long journeys myself.
Try and visualize an ocean, that's what I do. Just a calm ocean.
translation.de: Ich stelle mir einen ruhigen Ozean vor. Einen ruhigen Ozean.

translation.en: Oh no, that's--
Oh, dear.
Can I just borrow that a sec?
[Chelsea] Okay, guys.
Guys!
In order to stop you being bored, I have curated and printed off some brochures for your perusal.
translation.de: Zum Zeitvertreib habe ich Broschüren erstellt und ausgedruckt.

translation.en: No big deal, I was only up till 2.
translation.de: Kein Ding, ich war nur bis 2 Uhr wach.

translation.en: You'll find a map of the Green Arena,
some fun trivia about Monkhouse Dynamics and the winning essay,
translation.de: Fakten über Monkhouse Dynamics und das Gewinneressay,

translation.en: handpicked by Dalton Monkhouse himself, and the reason we get to attend such a prestigious event.
translation.de: ausgewählt von Dalton Monkhouse und Grund dieser besonderen Fahrt.

translation.en: Round of applause for Nas.
So, Nas, you're a Dalton Monkhouse stan, is that fair to say?
That is fair to say, Chelsea. Yes.
What can you tell us about him?
-Here we go. -Tell me when it's over.
Okay, so Dalton Monkhouse is the founder of Monkhouse Dynamics.
He's a multi-billionaire, a renowned environmentalist, a designer and engineer of next gen robotics.
translation.de: Multimilliardär, namhafter Umweltschützer und Entwickler modernster Roboter.

translation.en: He's also the only three-time recipient of the International Science Award.
translation.de: Nur er bekam dreimal den International Science Award.

translation.en: He's basically the coolest guy on the planet.
translation.de: Er ist der coolste Typ der Welt.

translation.en: It's all in the essay. Gimme that.
"My name is Nas." "Read my love letter to Dr. Monkhouse in this handy brochure."
translation.de: "Ich bin Nas. Mein Liebesbrief an Dr. Monkhouse ist in der Broschüre."

translation.en: Actually, it's not.
It's not a love letter, it's actually a thesis on the intrinsically disordered tardigrade proteins
translation.de: Kein Liebesbrief, sondern ein Essay über ungeordnete Tardigradenproteine

translation.en: and their potential biostasis applications.
That sounds amazing.
Really? You should give it a read.
Don't worry. I tried to make it as accessible to the layperson as I could.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Es ist für Laien verständlich.

translation.en: What did you call me?
Why don't you just leave him alone, Danny?
Everyone, listen up, yeah.
Misha's mate has got something to say. Go on, Misha's mate.
translation.de: Mishas Freundin will was sagen. Los, Mishas Freundin.

translation.en: Not the first time you couldn't get a girl to talk to you, eh? Daniel.
translation.de: Nicht das erste Mal, das keine mit dir redet, was?

translation.en: How are things with Sarah?
Oh, yeah. That's right. She dumped you.
translation.de: Ach ja. Genau. Sie hat dich verlassen.

translation.en: She got tired of holding her nose. Apparently, it's not only your personality that stinks.
translation.de: Sie musste sich ständig die Nase zuhalten. Nicht nur deine Persönlichkeit stinkt.

translation.en: I got this for you.
Oh. You can keep that. I won't be needing it.
translation.de: Behalte es. Brauche ich nicht. Komisch, genau das sagte Sarah über dich.

translation.en: Which is, coincidentally, exactly what Sarah said about you.
translation.de: Brauche ich nicht. Komisch, genau das sagte Sarah über dich.

translation.en: Start on her again
and I'll say way worse.
Okay, that's enough. Everyone settle down.
We'll be there in a minute. Stop throwing.
translation.de: Wir sind gleich da. Nicht werfen.

translation.en: -Mate, don't even worry about it, she's-- -Shut up.
Where's that bra gone?
[Misha] Forget about him.
-What'll we do about--? -Spikelangelo?
Oh, no, you named him. We've got a baby to look after now.
translation.de: -Er hat einen Namen. -Er ist unser Baby.

translation.en: -And you love him. -I wouldn't go that far.
-Give him a kiss. -Oh, no. Hey!
No!
-Yeah, he's not in there. -What?
Oh, my gosh. I'm a terrible parent.
Okay, just wait. Because we're running a little bit late…
translation.de: Bitte warten. Wir sind etwas spät…

translation.en: I know. For the last leg of our journey, we're gonna be traveling in style.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Der letzte Abschnitt der Reise wird stilvoll.

translation.en: No offense. So everyone off!
One at a time. Off you get. Slowly.
translation.de: Einer nach dem anderen. Los. Langsam.

translation.en: Yeah, one at a time. Don't… Yes. Give me some… Elbow in the face. Thank you.
translation.de: Einer nach dem anderen. Nicht… Ellbogen ins Gesicht. Danke.

translation.en: Yes!
Found my lunch.
I'm sorry if there's some sick on the seat.
translation.de: Sorry für das Erbrochene auf dem Sitz.

translation.en: How about that?
What do you think, Tom?
-It's all right, sir. -Yeah.
Danny? What do you think of that?
Did you know… Excuse me!
…Dalton Monkhouse built his first domestic robot when he was only nine years old?
translation.de: …dass Dr. Monkhouse mit nur neun Jahren den ersten Hausroboter baute?

translation.en: -Anyone tell me what it was called? -Alfred!
Nice one, Nas.
Okay, what about the robot called Percy? What did that one do?
translation.de: Und der Roboter namens Percy? Was hat der gemacht?

translation.en: It was a gardener! To help his mom plant the daffodils.
translation.de: Er war Gärtner und half seiner Mum.

translation.en: Well done again, Nas. Maybe let someone else have a go. Just…
translation.de: Gut. Aber lass mal einen anderen reden.

translation.en: give people a chance. Okay, what about this one?
translation.de: Gib ihnen eine Chance. Wie wär's damit?

translation.en: What did Monkhouse call his revolutionary AI network
translation.de: Wie nannte Monkhouse sein revolutionäres KI-Netzwerk,

translation.en: that allowed 75 drones to perform a synchronized light show at this year's Green Live concert?
translation.de: bei dem 75 Drohnen eine Lichtshow beim Green-Live-Konzert veranstalteten?

translation.en: -Family-- -No, sorry, Nas. Anyone else?
He called it the Kin Chip Network.
Get Tom doing the reading. Right you are, mate. Can I get a bump?
translation.de: Hausaufgaben gemacht, Tom! Super, Kumpel. Ghettofaust?

translation.en: I was gonna say Kin Chip. I was gonna say that.
It's okay not to know everything, champ. Nobody does.
translation.de: Es ist ok, nicht alles zu wissen. Keiner weiß alles.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.de: Willkommen in der Green Arena und willkommen in der Zukunft!

translation.en: Hand your phones in. You'll get them back after the presentation.
translation.de: Handys abgeben. Die gibt's später zurück.

translation.en: [Monkhouse hologram] I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.de: Willkommen in der Green Arena und willkommen in der Zukunft!

translation.en: So Nas doesn't know everything.
translation.de: Nas weiß also gar nicht alles.

translation.en: Least I know more than you.
Don't know more than Tom, though, do you?
translation.de: Aber nicht mehr als Tom, oder?

translation.en: Yeah, I do.
You hear that, Tom? Gonna let him chat like that about you?
translation.de: Hörst du, Tom? Darf er so über dich reden?

translation.en: -I'm not bothered, mate. -No.
I wouldn't have that, you know?
You can't let him do that. You've gotta do something.
translation.de: Das darfst du nicht zulassen. Tu was.

translation.en: You can't let him do that, bro.
Hey, that's my stuff!
Watch your mouth, yeah?
Pro tip from someone who's been there. Not everyone shares your enthusiasm for this stuff.
translation.de: Pro-Tipp von einer, die das kennt. Keiner teilt dein Interesse.

translation.en: -So, maybe dial it down a bit. -Dial "it" down?
What's "it"?
You know, your interests and passions.
The things that make me me?
Kind of?
"Sophie Roman. Sisterly advice, zero."
-Hey, Mom told me to look out for you. -I don't need looking out for!
translation.de: -Mum sagt, ich soll auf dich aufpassen. -Nicht nötig!

translation.en: How'd that go? Good? 'Cause we've got a hedgehog to liberate.
translation.de: Lief's gut? Wir müssen einen Igel befreien.

translation.en: [Monkhouse hologram] Hi, I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.de: Willkommen in der Green Arena und willkommen in der Zukunft!

translation.en: This is only the beginning.
Tomorrow will be better, believe me.
translation.de: Morgen wird es noch besser, wirklich.

translation.en: -He's gonna get himself in trubbs. -Please stop saying "trubbs."
translation.de: -Er kriegt Schwieris. -Hör auf, das zu sagen.

translation.en: New plan. You get Nas, I'll take care of Spikelangelo.
translation.de: Neuer Plan. Hol Nas, ich versorge Borstenangelo.

translation.en: [whispering] Nas?
Careful out there.
I swear, if you give me fleas, I will punt you over that hedge.
translation.de: Wenn du mir Flöhe verpasst, werfe ich dich über die Hecke.

translation.en: Enjoy paradise, son.
You lost one?
-He lost one. -Technically, it lost itself.
-You dropped it on the floor-- -Would you shut… Just shut up.
[stage manager] Two minutes. All stage crews to positions.
Just… get to positions.
We are not messing up the life's work of Dalton Monkhouse while the world is watching, okay?
translation.de: Wir verpfuschen Monkhouses Lebenswerk nicht vor der ganzen Welt, ok?

translation.en: [stage manager] One minute, everyone. Heroes on stage.
translation.de: Eine Minute. Helden auf die Bühne.

translation.en: Last looks, see you on the other side.
translation.de: Letzter Check. Wir sehen uns gleich.

translation.en: [whispering] Nas?
[event narrator] The world can be a dark place, but one man can bring the light.
translation.de: Die Welt mag ein dunkler Ort sein. Ein Mann kann uns erleuchten.

translation.en: That man's name is
Dalton Monkhouse.
Thank you.
Thank… No, thank you.
Thank you. Thank you very much.
And I am so sorry that I cannot be there with you in person today,
translation.de: Es tut mir leid, dass ich nicht persönlich da sein kann,

translation.en: but I am with you all in digital spirit.
translation.de: aber ich bin bei euch im digitalen Geiste.

translation.en: That's right, thanks to Monkhouse Dynamics' Holo-sapiens technology,
translation.de: Dank der Holosapiens-Technologie von Monkhouse Dynamics

translation.en: I have finally achieved omnipresence.
Hello, Rio.
Hello, Tokyo.
Hello, Mumbai.
Hello, humanity.
And hello, planet Earth.
Beautiful, isn't she?
Well,
take a good look, because it might be your last.
translation.de: Seht gut hin, denn es könnte euer letzter Blick sein.

translation.en: What?
The world is doomed?
But we all use paper straws instead of plastic in our milkshakes now.
translation.de: Aber wir verwenden doch Pappstrohhalme statt Plastik für unsere Milchshakes.

translation.en: Is that not enough?
Ah. Stop it! Pay attention.
Watching you. Watch the presentation, please!
translation.de: Ich hab euch im Blick. Hört ihm zu!

translation.en: You know, I've gotta say that after 20 years
translation.de: Ich muss schon sagen, nach 20 Jahren

translation.en: of cleaning plastic out of the ocean, fertilizing arid land,
translation.de: Plastik aus den Ozeanen fischen, Ödland fruchtbar machen,

translation.en: repopulating endangered species…
You're welcome, by the way.
…I had a revelation.
Pollution.
Deforestation.
Hunting species to extinction.
So, who does all of that?
You do.
That's right.
You people can't solve the planet's problem
translation.de: Ihr könnt das Problem der Erde nicht lösen,

translation.en: because the planet's problem is people.
translation.de: weil ihr selbst das Problem seid.

translation.en: So, whose fault is it, really,
that the world is on the brink of destruction?
translation.de: dass die Welt am Rande der Zerstörung steht?

translation.en: It's my fault.
I expected too much of you.
translation.de: Ich habe zu viel von euch erwartet.

translation.en: I mean, you're only human.
You've done all you can. You really have. But I haven't.
translation.de: Ihr habt wirklich alles getan. Aber ich nicht.

translation.en: So I started thinking.
If I had a magic lamp, what would I wish for?
translation.de: Wenn ich eine Wunderlampe hätte, was würde ich mir wünschen?

translation.en: Well, clean up the environment,
end climate change,
bring about world peace?
No, come on.
No, there's no way
that you can achieve all of that in one fell swoop.
translation.de: schafft man das alles auf einmal.

translation.en: Is there?
Well, there wasn't.
Until now.
Friends, humans, Earth people,
I give you the Monkhouse Dynamics Genie Orb!
Here they come.
Little cheeky.
"Why genie?" I hear you ask.
Well, because our wish is their command.
translation.de: Nun, denn unser Wunsch ist ihr Befehl.

translation.en: You want to put a stop to climate change? Done.
translation.de: Ihr wollt den Klimawandel stoppen? Hier.

translation.en: You want to clean up the planet? No problem.
translation.de: Ihr wollt den Planeten wiederherstellen? Kein Problem.

translation.en: You want to bring about world peace?
Oh, go on then.
Now, I know what you're all thinking.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was ihr jetzt denkt.

translation.en: "How could these little things do all of that, Dalton?"
translation.de: "Wie können diese kleinen Dinger solche Dinge tun, Dalton?"

translation.en: And the answer is, with your help.
translation.de: Und die Antwort ist, mit eurer Hilfe.

translation.en: Now, I need you to do something for me, okay?
translation.de: Ihr müsst jetzt etwas für mich tun, ok?

translation.en: All I need you to do is just…
look into the light.
That's it.
Can you feel it?
Can you feel it?
Just let it in.
Let it wash over you.
That warm, healing glow. Just let it in.
translation.de: Dieser warme, heilende Schein. Nehmt ihn auf.

translation.en: Just look into the light.
That's it.
What was that?
That was you interrupting what might have been the first meaningful contact
translation.de: Deine Störung des ersten bedeutsamen Kontakts

translation.en: between man and machine.
Oh. Sorry.
It was incredible.
Like it was reaching out to me somehow.
translation.de: Als würde es mich erreichen wollen.

translation.en: A connection.
[Monkhouse hologram] Hear the sound of my voice.
Just look into the light.
Trust me,
and believe me when I say
translation.de: und glaubt mir, wenn ich sage:

translation.en: that I am sending you all
to a better place.
